name: Pongbot Swing
description:
Pongbot Swing is a sci-fi themed rhythm game with a robot as the main character named 'Pongbot' who has  hobby of jumping and falling.

HOW TO PLAY?
  • Single click on Green Platform
  • Double click on Yellow Platform
  • Hold click on Pink Platform
CREDITS

We are a group of friends from Megareka Studio that decided to work together on a little game for participating on IGSI Game Jam 2022. This was made in 2 week in our free time. 

Muhammad Rauf - Programmer & Composer Music
Dany Zaky - Technical Artist & 2D Artist UI
Ambrosius Farrel - 2D Artist Character
Aruu - 2D Artist Background
Gani Sigit - Animator 
Mijil Pamungkas - Beat Maker
